code: import{useState}from"react";import"./Answers.css";import Results from"../Results/Results";import{updateAnswer}from"../../requests/updateAnswer";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Answers=_ref=>{let{answers,scores}=_ref;const[submittedAnswers,setSubmittedAnswers]=useState(()=>{const answersArray=localStorage.getItem("answerArray");if(answersArray){return JSON.parse(answersArray);}});const handleSetAnswer=answer=>{const updatedAnswers=[answer,...submittedAnswers];localStorage.setItem("answerArray",JSON.stringify(updatedAnswers));setSubmittedAnswers(updatedAnswers);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[submittedAnswers.length<=9&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"button-container",children:answers.map((answer,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:()=>{updateAnswer(answer);handleSetAnswer(answer);},children:answer.answer},"".concat(answer.id,"=").concat(index));})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:submittedAnswers&&submittedAnswers.length>=10&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Results,{scores:scores&&scores.length?scores:submittedAnswers})})]});};export default Answers;
